You can have 12 windows at most

Show the Select button on the tool bar

Upload remote file automatically when it is edited locally by 3rd party app

File can not be restored after deleted

Are you sure to move folder {0} to Recycle Bin?

"The following apps are removed. You can delete associated folders"
Data cannot be recovered after deleting
Clean associated folders when apps are removed

The file(greater than 2G) is too large to encrypt
Your system forbids ES from writing on external SD card(check https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=67570), so ES can only write on it after rooted.

"Testing successfully, you can modify external SD card now.
To make this permanently, you can install ES into system, install now?"

Google play service is not available or need update.

"Chromecast plugin is not found or need update.
Do you want to find and install?"
Please make sure Chromecast available in the LAN
Please keep your password safe, it cannot be recovered if forgotten
Cannot find ES Permission Manager plugin. Download now?
Please choose the root directory %1$s(%2$s) of ext-SDCard to grant ES permission to operate
"Tasks are running. USB device can not be safely unmounted. Please finish the running task and retry, or force eject."
Force eject might lead to lose of any running file
Show SD card usage on status bar
Show SD card on status bar
Failed to download the plug-in, cannot complete this operation
This can be found in PCS/downloads after hiding the dialog
Please input your mobile phone number
Get verification code by sms free.
You are using a temp account. Set username and password to keep the contents
Use only alphabets, number and underline in username
You account is not activated, please check mails
Wrong verification code, please input it again
This phone number is not existed
Network failure, please try it later
Verification code is expired, please get it again
Too many sms, try it 24 hours later
The phone number has been used
Too simple password, please change it
Username and password cannot be empty
Getting sms verify code, please wait
The sms verify code has been sent, please receive and input it
%1$sShare a file to you,Please click this link and select ESDownloader %2$s to download: %3$s
You have to login to use this feature
Set a name for the backup
Login success, you can use PCS now
Cannot use temp account, create a new account
This device needs formal account to login
Password need > 6 digits, and cannot be all numbers
Please login or register before using this function
The Netdisk can not be deleted, and you can hide it from the Settings
Including the Netdisk, which could not be deleted. You can hide it from the Settings
Baidu net drive upgraded to PCS, please login in PCS

"Your account has not been verified.
To ensure the security of your pcs account, verify code will be sent to your phone by SMS."
The phone number has been registered, please login or try another phone number.
" Press next to input the verify code in SMS."
Press last and try other numbers
You are using temporary account, please verify the account as soon as possible to ensure the security of your PCS.
Your net disk is empty. You can drag your local folders to net disk to backup the files!
It may take some time to get the verification sms, please wait...
If you have not get the verification sms, please click the resend button to get the verification sms again.
Welcome to ES File Explorer! Using the network feature in ES will generate network traffic, its cost depends on your local network. Continue?
Add app in auto detect list
Click button to remove from auto detect list
Signature conflict found. You need uninstall the older version before installation, Continue?

Please update ES File Explorer first
You need newer version Baidu App Search
your phone has not been rooted yet, try below software

Please use Chinese mobile phone number

Are you like to expand PCS volume?
Failed to get PCS Resource, please refresh later.

"Love ES File Explorer? Thanks for your support as always."
Toolbar Style can also be changed in Theme-Edit-Set layout.
Save failed, please check your SD card
A must-have tool to protect your apps from unauthorized access!
Analyze for large files taking up space
Supports local and remote playback; create you own playlist
Uninstall useless system apps, SD card apps, backed-up apps

"Items of this category are the files you downloaded. Are you sure you want to select it?"
Unlicensed version. Please uninstall this version and buy official ES File Explorer Pro in Google Play.
Unlicensed version. Please get official ES File Explorer Free version.

"Licence request failure.This may be caused by reasons as followed: 1.Google Play not installed 2.Not connected to network 3.Not logged in Google Play Please check them and then retry licensing here."
